mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your sense of entitlement is our top priority! Sign up today and never worry about limits again.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this, folks. I was at my favorite caf, sipping on my triple-shot latte when I realized I left my designer sunglasses in the restroom. Naturally, I called up the manager and demanded they shut down the entire caf until my sunglasses were found. Can you believe they had the audacity to even suggest that I wait until closing time to retrieve them? I mean, the nerve! After making a huge scene and threatening to leave a scathing review on every platform imaginable, they finally caved and found my precious shades within minutes. Victory was mine, and once again, my sense of entitlement prevailed. Who needs patience when you have power, am I right?
